title: Silver Needle White Tea
description: Delicate white tea with silver buds and subtle, sweet honey-like flavor.
longDescription: Silver Needle (Bai Hao Yinzhen) is a premium white tea made from the young buds of the tea plant. The leaves are hand-picked in early spring when the buds are covered in fine white hairs, giving them a silvery appearance. The infusion is pale yellow with a delicate aroma of fresh flowers and honey. The flavor is light and sweet with a smooth, velvety texture and a lingering finish. Silver Needle is known for its high antioxidant content and is often considered one of the finest white teas available.
brewingInstructions: Use water at 160°F (70°C). Steep for 4-6 minutes. Can be infused multiple times.

reviews.comment: This Silver Needle is exquisite! The delicate flavor and smooth texture are simply divine.

reviews.author: Tea Connoisseur
reviews.comment: A lovely white tea with a sweet, floral aroma. Perfect for a light afternoon brew.
